category.name: DecisionApps.RelationBrowser
category.category_description: Preferences for Decision Apps Relation Browser.

preference.name: RV1_DARB_Filter_Properties
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of properties for the "Filter" panel in Relation Browser. If the property is defined on a sub-type of WorkspaceObject type, prefix the property with the type name e.g. ItemRevision:current_id.
